text:
and in-kind political contributions made directly and indirectly by the undertaking, aggregated by
country or geographical area where relevant, as well as type of recipient/beneficiary ...’
Answer
The Disclosure Requirement refers to the type of recipient/beneficiary and does not extend to
the name of the beneficiary.
